name: recola-sm
description: Standard Model files for the Recola generator.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: collier
dependencies.description:
COLLIER: A Complex One-Loop LIbrary with Extended Regularizations for
the numerical evaluation of one-loop scalar and tensor integrals
appearing in perturbative relativistic quantum field theory.

dependent_to.name: recola
dependent_to.description:
REcursive Computation of One-Loop Amplitudes: a fortran library for the
perturbative computation of next-to-leading-order transition amplitudes
in the Standard Model of particle physics.
